>
[Elementalist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=4340) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Class" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=397" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Rage of Elements](/Sources.aspx?ID=205) pg. 59 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Elementalist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=207)

**Prerequisites**
elemental magic

</column>

---

Each day when you make your daily preparations, you can attune yourself to one element of your choice from your elemental philosophy. You gain resistance equal to half your level (minimum 1 resistance) against damage dealt by effects with your attuned elemental trait. This attunement lasts until you next make your daily preparations.

<title level="2">Elementalist Dedication leads to...</title>
[Burning Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=4343), [Current Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=4344), [Dousing Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=4341), [Elemental Familiar](/Feats.aspx?ID=4342), [Expanded Elemental Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=4345), [Growth Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=4348), [Metabolize Element](/Feats.aspx?ID=4346), [Redirect Elements](/Feats.aspx?ID=4350), [Reverberating Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=4347), [Rockslide Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=4349), [Water Step](/Feats.aspx?ID=4351), [Wind-Tossed Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=4352)
